A more organic time-tested approach to household infestations. Critters don't survive Cold. (But I'm sure there must be exceptions.)
Furniture is placed outside for a minimum of 8 hours, when it is 0 degrees or Colder. It has to be COLD. Everything washable is washed in hot water and a very hot . Everything has to be done all at once, leaving nothing out. Even one item will reinfect everything else.Small items that can't be washed in hot water and put in a hot (like fur hats, special quilts, etc.): seal in a Ziploc bag and put in a freezer for at least 3 days.
